inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getPortfolioConstraints.

acceptLanguage.description: Language code. Valid values: `en` (English), `jp` (Japanese), `zh` (Chinese). Default value is `en`.

portfolioId.description:
Portfolio identifier.

The following arguments are optional:

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getPortfolioConstraints.

details.description: List of information about the constraints. See details below.

id.description: The provider-assigned unique ID for this managed resource.

portfolioId.description: Identifier of the portfolio the product resides in. The constraint applies only to the instance of the product that lives within this portfolio.

productId.description: Identifier of the product the constraint applies to. A constraint applies to a specific instance of a product within a certain portfolio.
